Package org.fudgemsg.xml

Tools for converting Fudge messages to/from XML representations.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
FudgeXMLSettings Base class to hold common data for the Fudge XML reader and writer as defined by the specification that can be customized for a specific XML source or destination.
FudgeXMLStreamWriter Implementation of a FudgeStreamWriter that writes XML to a text stream.
 

Enum Summary
FudgeXMLSettings.XMLEnvelopeAttribute Attributes available for the envelope element.
FudgeXMLSettings.XMLFieldAttribute Attributes available for a field element.
 

Package org.fudgemsg.xml Description

Tools for converting Fudge messages to/from XML representations.
